name: Glee Tree's Jamlar Challenge
description: Glee Tree is a really short run and jump game about a plant going around a temple and that's it. I only had around 5 hours to actually make this because of how busy I am.  Not only did I make the song for the entire jam (Yes, I'm the actual composer of this jam's song) but I made a little game as well.  For anyone asking, the reason why there is windows USB sounds in the song is because while recording I was having technical difficulties with my phone that was charging and it kept unplugging/replugging etc.
